title: Guestlisted with Jed Gottlieb
text:
Guestlisted with Jed Gottlieb
Hip hop superstar Flo Rida and DJ/producer Marc Mysterio, who lived in Boston for years, will release a One Fund charity single Monday.
"Booty on the Floor" -- these two clearly aren't wallowing in depression -- is a thumping electro jam with a hook that shouts "Put your booty on the floor!" The song will be available exclusively on Beatport and all net proceeds will go to the families affected via OneFundBoston.org.
"God Bless the families affected by the Boston Marathon Explosion, I'm praying for you all" Flo Rida said via Twitter.
